accountAssets(address,uint256).notice: Per-account mapping of "assets you are in", capped by maxAssets

closeFactorMantissa().notice: Multiplier used to calculate the maximum repayAmount when liquidating a borrow

lastContributorBlock(address).notice: Last block at which a contributor's PERIDOT rewards have been allocated

liquidationIncentiveMantissa().notice: Multiplier representing the discount on collateral that a liquidator receives

markets(address).notice: Official mapping of pTokens -> Market metadata

maxAssets().notice: Max number of assets a single account can participate in (borrow or use as collateral)

oracle().notice: Oracle which gives the price of any given asset

pauseGuardian().notice: The Pause Guardian can pause certain actions as a safety mechanism.  Actions which allow users to remove their own assets cannot be paused.  Liquidation / seizing / transfer can only be paused globally, not by market.

peridotAccrued(address).notice: The PERIDOT accrued but not yet transferred to each user

peridotBorrowSpeeds(address).notice: The rate at which peridot is distributed to the corresponding borrow market (per block)

peridotBorrowState(address).notice: The PERIDOT market borrow state for each market

peridotBorrowerIndex(address,address).notice: The PERIDOT borrow index for each market for each borrower as of the last time they accrued PERIDOT

peridotContributorSpeeds(address).notice: The portion of PERIDOT that each contributor receives per block

peridotRate().notice: The rate at which the flywheel distributes PERIDOT, per block

peridotReceivable(address).notice: Accounting storage mapping account addresses to how much PERIDOT they owe the protocol.

peridotSpeeds(address).notice: The portion of peridotRate that each market currently receives

peridotSupplierIndex(address,address).notice: The PERIDOT borrow index for each market for each supplier as of the last time they accrued PERIDOT

peridotSupplySpeeds(address).notice: The rate at which peridot is distributed to the corresponding supply market (per block)

peridotSupplyState(address).notice: The PERIDOT market supply state for each market

proposal65FixExecuted().notice: Flag indicating whether the function to fix PERIDOT accruals has been executed (RE: proposal 62 bug)
